title: The Hypnotist
description: An old school chum proves irksome and gets treatment.

title: Second Honeymoon
description: Cosmo and Henrietta celebrate their 25th wedding anniversary by spending the night at their honeymoon hotel. Trouble is, it now seems to be haunted, and not by George and Marion.

title: Economy
description: Cosmo wants to economize on home expenses. Henrietta and the Kerbys agree. However, their attempts at home repairs are disastrous, and lead to Topper's spending more money than ever.

title: Topper Runs for Mayor
description: Cosmo decides to run for mayor, but then finds out that his boss is the campaign manager for his opponent.

title: The Painting
description: Henrietta and Marion take up painting as a hobby, but after Cosmo and George get a look at their "artworks", they try to come up with a way to discourage their wives from pursuing it any further.

title: Henrietta Sells the House
description: Henrietta decides to sell the house. This does not sit well with ghosts Marion and George.

title: Legacy
description: George and Marian's grandfather Augustus Kerby dies, leaving them a million dollars. However, since they're already dead, that could pose some legal problems.

title: Topper Goes to Las Vegas
description: Topper is sent to Las Vegas on bank business; George and Marion insist on coming along and helping him win. This gets him in hot water with the management.

title: Sweepstakes
description: The Kerbys play a joke on Cosmo by making him believe he's won $800,000 playing the Irish Sweepstakes.

title: The Package
description: When a package for the Kerbys arrives at the Toppers' house, Henrietta sends it back to the post office's Dead Letters Office. George and Marian, wanting to know what the package is, enlist Cosmo's help in getting it back.

title: The Chess Player
description: Topper is expecting a visit from his pen pal chess partner, whom he has never met. However, he is surprised when the chess player turns out to be a young boy genius -- who also doesn't believe in ghosts.

title: Topper Fights a Duel
description: Topper embarks on a business deal involving truffles and winds up in a duel with a French envoy.
